messages.messageBody:
Update on my entry in the Moeyoken fanart contest:

Name: Tokugawa Aoi (Yoshinobu's daughter)
Also known as: Aoi-hime
Age: 22
Weapons: Katana/wakizashi, tanto, naginata, Smith & Wesson revolver,
and kunai (the thin kind that looks like a nail).
Carries: Tanto in obi knot, (sometimes) revolver in her large sleeves,
and kunai in...secret places. ;)
Character: Aristocratic. Deliciously, seductively arrogant. Like the
one girl in high school who was so incredibly beautiful yet utterly
unapproachable. Occasionally has Matsudaira and Kondou's daughters
over for sleepovers or tea ceremony.

Will post when the scanner at school is repaired.

--M.
